items.sentence: Didn\'t you know Tom isn\'t really from Australia?
Tom took a picture of his dog and sent it to Mary.
Tom took his coat out of the closet and put it on.
Tom took off his clothes and got into the bathtub.
Tom translated the letter from French into German.
Will you take care of the children while I\'m out?
You don\'t need to be religious to believe in God.
You don\'t really think Tom would do that, do you?
You don\'t really want to talk about this, do you?
You don\'t think Tom really could do that, do you?
